scripts.start:celeste: yarn build:celeste && monk load celeste/celeste-backend.yaml && monk run 1hive/celeste-stack
scripts.start:price-oracle: yarn build:price-oracle && monk load others/price-oracle.yaml && monk run 1hive/price-oracle
scripts.start:fluid: yarn build:fluid && monk load others/fluid-proposals.yaml && monk run 1hive/fluid-proposals
scripts.start:honeymaker: yarn build:honeymaker && monk load others/honeymaker.yaml && monk run 1hive/honeymaker
scripts.build:celeste: node scripts/env.js --inyml celeste/celeste-backend_template.yaml  --outyml celeste/celeste-backend.yaml backend backend-local
scripts.build:price-oracle: node scripts/env.js --env others/.env --inyml others/price-oracle_template.yaml  --outyml others/price-oracle.yaml price-oracle
scripts.build:fluid: node scripts/env.js --env others/.env.fluid --inyml others/fluid-proposals_template.yaml  --outyml others/fluid-proposals.yaml fluid-proposals
scripts.build:honeymaker: node scripts/env.js --env others/.env.honeymaker --inyml others/honeymaker_template.yaml  --outyml others/honeymaker.yaml honeymaker
